title: Lords of Dogtown
creator_credit: Cindy Evans, Chris Gorak, Stacy Peralta, Senator International, Indelible Pictures, The Linson Company, Columbia Pictures, TriStar Pictures, Catherine Hardwicke and John Linson
headline_credit: Germany and United States of America, 2005
brief_description: Lords of Dogtown tells the radical true story behind three teenage surfers from Venice Beach, California, who took skateboarding to the extreme and changed the world of sports forever.

constellations_other.name: Skate or die
constellations_other.description: Skateboarding is a subculture frequently documented, from amateur skate videos filmed with fish-eye lenses, to documentaries exploring the genesis of the subculture and gritty feature films depicting underlying social dynamics.

creator_credit_for_label: Cindy Evans, Chris Gorak, Stacy Peralta, Senator International, Indelible Pictures, The Linson Company, Columbia Pictures, TriStar Pictures, Catherine Hardwicke and John Linson
description: The radical true story behind three teenage surfers from Venice Beach, California, who took skateboarding to the extreme and changed the world of sports forever. Stacy Peralta, Tony Alva and Jay Adams are the Z-Boys, a bunch of nobodies until they create a new style of skateboarding that becomes a worldwide phenomenon. But when their hobby becomes a business, the success shreds their friendship.
description_for_label: The radical true story behind three teenage surfers from Venice Beach, California, who took skateboarding to the extreme and changed the world of sports forever. Stacy Peralta, Tony Alva and Jay Adams are the Z-Boys, a bunch of nobodies until they create a new style of skateboarding that becomes a worldwide phenomenon. But when their hobby becomes a business, the success shreds their friendship.
